description.zh-cn: 中国戏剧学家、文学史家，南京大学人文社会科学荣誉资深教授，南京大学原副校长。
description.en: Chinese drama theorist, literary historian, honorary senior professor of humanities and social sciences at Nanjing University, and former vice president of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 董健曾在此求学、任教并担任副校长。
description.en: Dong Jian studied, taught, and served as vice president here.
Dong Jian was admitted to this institute in 1956.

nodes.id: 南京大学中国语言文学系

zh-cn: 南京大学中国语言文学系

description.zh-cn: 董健于1957年转入该系学习。
description.en: Dong Jian transferred to this department to study in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 董健在南京大学攻读硕士研究生期间的导师。
description.en: Dong Jian's supervisor during his postgraduate studies at Nanjing University.
Dong Jian was a native of Shouguang, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 1956年考入北京俄语学院，1957年转学。
description.en: Admitted to the Beijing Russian Language Institute in 1956 and transferred in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 1957年至1962年在南京大学中国语言文学系完成本科学习，1962年至1965年攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Completed his undergraduate studies at the Department of Chinese Language and Literature, Nanjing University from 1957 to 1962, and pursued postgraduate studies from 1962 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 1965年毕业后留校任教，后曾任南京大学副校长，及人文社会科学荣誉资深教授。
description.en: After graduating in 1965, he stayed at the university to teach, and later served as vice president and honorary senior professor of humanities and social sciences.

description.zh-cn: 在南京大学攻读硕士研究生期间，师从陈中凡。
description.en: During his postgraduate studies at Nanjing University, he was a student of Chen Zhongfan.

relationships.source: 南京大学中国语言文学系

description.zh-cn: 南京大学中国语言文学系是南京大学下属的院系。
description.en: The Department of Chinese Language and Literature is a department under Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 董健是中国作家协会会员。
description.en: Dong Jian was a member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 董健是中国戏剧家协会会员。
description.en: Dong Jian was a member of the China Theatre Association.

description.zh-cn: 董健是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Dong Jian was a member of the Communist Party of China.
